data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Tamanghasset access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tamanghasset, Algeria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Tamanghasset, Algeria with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 176,600 people living in Tamanghasset through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Tamanghasset, Algeria that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, cause the 120 believers in Tamanghasset to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 120 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Tamanghasset.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tamanghasset, Algeria has a population of 176,600.

We estimate Tamanghasset has 120 people who might know Jesus, 15 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 176,465 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,471 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 176,600 citizens of the the state of Tamanghasset.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.
